description.english: Resume your old life
description.german: Nimm dein altes Leben wieder auf
description.french: Reprendre votre ancienne vie
description.italian: Riprendi la tua vecchia vita
description.spanish: Retoma tu antigua vida.
description.tchinese: 重拾舊有生活
description.japanese: ランナーに復帰する
description.polish: Odzyskaj dawne życie.
description.brazilian: Retorne à sua vida normal

description.english: Take flight with some old friends
description.german: Hebe mit einigen alten Freunden ab
description.french: S'envoler avec de vieux amis
description.italian: Spicca il volo con dei vecchi amici
description.spanish: Alza el vuelo con viejos amigos.
description.tchinese: 與老朋友一起飛行
description.japanese: 旧友たちと街を飛び回る
description.polish: Poleć ze starymi znajomymi.
description.brazilian: Voe com alguns velhos amigos

description.english: Escape with a gift from an old enemy
description.german: Entkomme mit einem Geschenk von einem alten Feind
description.french: S'enfuir avec un cadeau d'un vieil ennemi
description.italian: Fuggi con il dono di un vecchio nemico
description.spanish: Escapa con un regalo de un antiguo enemigo.
description.tchinese: 帶著過往敵人送的禮物逃跑
description.russian: Убегите с подарком от старого врага
description.japanese: 昔の敵からのプレゼントを持って逃げる
description.polish: Ucieknij z prezentem od wroga.
description.brazilian: Fuja com um presente de um velho inimigo

displayName.italian: È ora di una rissa furibonda

description.english: First crack the shell, then crack what's inside
description.german: Knacke zuerst die Schale und dann das, was sich darin befindet
description.french: Il faut d'abord faire craquer l'armure, puis cracker ce qu'elle protège
description.italian: Prima rompi il guscio e poi rompi il suo contenuto
description.spanish: Primero rompe el caparazón, luego lo que hay dentro.
description.tchinese: 先敲開外殼，再打破內裡
description.russian: Взломайте оболочку и заберите то, что внутри
description.japanese: まずは拠点の殻を破り、敵の内情を探る
description.polish: Najpierw rozbij skorupkę, potem to, co w środku.
description.brazilian: Primeiro quebre a casca, depois o que está dentro

description.english: Witness a terrifying event
description.german: Werde Zeuge eines schrecklichen Ereignisses
description.french: Être témoin d'un événement terrifiant
description.italian: Assisti a un evento terrificante
description.spanish: Presencia un evento aterrador.
description.tchinese: 目睹一場驚駭事件
description.japanese: 恐ろしい出来事を目撃する
description.polish: Bądź świadkiem strasznego zdarzenia.
description.brazilian: Veja um evento aterrorizante

description.english: Repay Dogen
description.german: Begleiche deine Schulden bei Dogen
description.french: Rembourser Dogen
description.italian: Ripaga Dogen
description.spanish: Salda tu deuda con Dogen.
description.tchinese: 把欠道元的還清
description.japanese: ドーゲンに借りを返す
description.polish: Spłać dług u Dogena.
description.brazilian: Quite sua dívida com Dogen

description.english: Avenge them
description.german: Räche sie
description.french: Les venger
description.italian: Vendicali
description.spanish: Véngales.
description.tchinese: 替他們復仇
description.japanese: 復讐の念に燃える
description.polish: Pomścij ich.
description.brazilian: Vingue-os

description.english: Seek out Black November for help
description.german: Suche Black November auf, um Hilfe zu erhalten
description.french: Chercher Black November pour leur demander de l'aide
description.italian: Cerca Novembre Nero per chiedere aiuto
description.spanish: Pide ayuda a Noviembre Negro.
description.tchinese: 尋求黑色十一月的協助
description.japanese: ブラック・ノベンバーの手を借りる
description.polish: Poproś Czarny Listopad o pomoc.
description.brazilian: Procure a ajuda do Novembro Sombrio

description.english: Send the KrugerSec turrets into the abyss
description.german: Stürze die KrugerSec-Geschütze in den Abgrund
description.french: Envoyer les tourelles de KrugerSec dans l'abîme
description.italian: Spingi le torrette della KrugerSec nell'abisso
description.spanish: Empuja las torretas de KrugerSec por un saliente.
description.tchinese: 將庫格保全的砲塔推入深淵
description.japanese: クルーガーセックのターレットを下に突き落とす
description.polish: Poślij wieżyczki KrugerSec w otchłań
description.brazilian: Empurre as torretas da KrugerSec para o abismo

description.english: Resistance is futile
description.german: Widerstand ist zwecklos
description.french: Toute résistance serait futile
description.italian: Resistere è inutile
description.spanish: Es inútil resistirse.
description.tchinese: 反抗是沒有用的
description.japanese: 抵抗しても無駄だ
description.polish: Opór jest daremny.
description.brazilian: Resistir é inútil

description.english: Claw back what they took from you
description.german: Hol dir zurück, was dir genommen wurde
description.french: Récupérer ce qu'ils vous ont pris
description.italian: Riconquista quel che ti hanno tolto
description.spanish: Recupera lo que te han arrebatado.
description.tchinese: 把他們從你身上奪走的搶回來
description.russian: Заберите то, что у вас отняли
description.japanese: クルーガーセックに奪われたものを取り返す
description.polish: Odbierz im to, co ci zabrali.
description.brazilian: Recupere o que tiraram de você

description.english: Discover the identity of Kruger's deadliest asset
description.german: Enthülle die Identität von Krugers tödlichster Helferin
description.french: Découvrir l'identité de l'atout le plus meurtrier de Kruger
description.italian: Scopri l'identità della risorsa più letale di Kruger
description.spanish: Descubre la identidad del arma más letal de Kruger.
description.tchinese: 揭開庫格致命利器的真面目
description.russian: Установите личность самого опасного сотрудника Крюгера
description.japanese: クルーガーセックで最も危険な人物の正体を知る
description.polish: Odkryj tożsamość najgroźniejszego pracownika Krugera.
description.brazilian: Descubra a identidade da arma mais letal de Kruger

description.english: Escape from the heart of darkness
description.german: Entkomme aus dem Herzen der Finsternis
description.french: S'enfuir du cœur des ténèbres
description.italian: Fuggi dal cuore di tenebra
description.spanish: Escapa del corazón de las tinieblas.
description.tchinese: 逃脫黑暗之心
description.japanese: 暗闇の中心から脱出する
description.polish: Ucieczka z jądra ciemności.
description.brazilian: Escape do coração da escuridão

description.english: Take what is his and make it crumble
description.german: Nimm dir, was ihm gehört, und vernichte es
description.french: Prendre ce qui lui appartient et faire que son rêve s'effondre
description.italian: Prendi quel che è suo e mandalo in frantumi
description.spanish: Arrebátale lo que es suyo y haz que se desmorone.
description.tchinese: 拿走屬於他的東西，粉碎殆盡
description.japanese: クルーガーのグリッドプリントを奪う
description.polish: Zniszcz to, co należy do niego.
description.brazilian: Pegue o que é dele e destrua

description.english: Hack. Tick. Tock. Run. Repeat.
description.german: Hacke. Ticktack. Laufe. Wiederhole das Ganze.
description.french: Pirater. Tic-tac. Tic-Tac. Courir. Rebelote.
description.italian: Hackera. Tic. Tac. Corri. Ripeti.
description.spanish: Hackea. Tic. Tac. Corre. Repite.
description.tchinese: 駭入，分秒必爭，快跑，再一次。
description.japanese: 時間に追われてハックして走ってまたハック！
description.polish: Zhakuj. Pospiesz się. Uciekaj. Powtórz.
description.brazilian: Hackeie. Tique-taque. Corra. Repita.

displayName.german: Blut ist dicker als alles andere
displayName.french: Rien ne vaut les liens du sang
displayName.brazilian: Sangue é mais denso que tudo

description.english: Shut down any gridNode without notifying KrugerSec of your presence

description.polish: Wyłącz gridNode w ukryciu przed oficerami KrugerSec.
description.brazilian: Desligue qualquer gridNode sem notificar a KrugerSec da sua presença
